context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
A TRUSTWORTHY DOCTOR
I have been Dr. Madhumathi's patient since 2016 for pcod. She is very attentive and caring towards her patients health conditions. When I got to know that am pregnant, my go to person was Dr.Madhumathi.
Though I was been in other state until my second trimester, she was always a call away to advice and guide me. Her investigations are deeper and makes sure her patient is perfectly alright. In a word, journey with such doctor is stress free and happy. 
I strongly recommend Dr madhumathi for any of your gynic problems and obstetrics

Dr. Madhumathi is very very helpful and supportive throughout the pregnancy and even during labour, I have had the best experience with Dr. Madhumathi, I couldn’t have asked for any other best doctor for my first pregnancy, you can be assured you are in safe hands when she treats you.
